quotes.quote: Hard work and togetherness. They go hand in hand. You need the hard work because it’s such a tough atmosphere….to win week in and week out. You need togetherness because you don’t always win, and you gotta hang tough together
quotes.author: Tony Dungy

quotes.quote: With confidence, you have won even before you have started.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: If you don’t have confidence, you’ll always find a way not to win.
quotes.author: Carl Lewis

quotes.quote: Nobody roots for Goliath
quotes.author: Wilt Chamberlain

quotes.quote: I want to rip out his heart and feed it to him. I want to kill people. I want to rip their stomachs out and eat their children.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.quote: I think it’s the mark of a great player to be confident in tough situations.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Procrastination is one of the most common and deadliest of diseases and its toll on success and happiness is heavy.
quotes.author: Fred Devito

quotes.quote: You can’t get much done in life if you only work on the days when you feel good.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: The man who complains about the way the ball bounces is likely the one who dropped it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Mental will is a muscle that needs exercise, just like muscles of the body.
quotes.author: Lynn Jennings

quotes.quote: You owe it to yourself to be the best you can possibly be – in baseball and in life.
quotes.author: Pete Rose

quotes.quote: Experience is a hard teacher because she gives the test first, the lesson afterward.
quotes.author: Vernon

quotes.quote: Difficulties in life are intended to make us better, not bitter.
quotes.author: Dan Reeves

quotes.quote: The best motivation always comes from within.
quotes.author: Michael Johnson

quotes.quote: I learned that if you want to make it bad enough, no matter how bad it is, you can make it.
quotes.author: Gale Sayers

quotes.quote: For me, winning isn’t something that happens suddenly on the field when the whistle blows and the crowds roar. Winning is something that builds physically and mentally every day that you train and every night that you dream.
quotes.author: Emmitt Smith

quotes.quote: The difference between the old ballplayer and the new ballplayer is the jersey. The old ballplayer cared about the name on the front. The new ballplayer cares about the name on the back.
quotes.author: Steve Garvey

quotes.quote: To succeed…You need to find something to hold on to, something to motivate you, something to inspire you.
quotes.author: Tony Dorsett

quotes.quote: Win or lose you will never regret working hard, making sacrifices, being disciplined or focusing too much. Success is measured by what we have done to prepare for competition
quotes.author: John Smith

quotes.quote: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don’t play together, the club won’t be worth a dime.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Whoever said, ‘It’s not whether you win or lose that counts,’ probably lost.
quotes.author: Martina Navratilova

quotes.quote: Treat a person as he is, and he will remain as he is. Treat him as he could be, and he will become what he should be.
quotes.author: Jimmy Johnson

quotes.quote: Every kid around the world who plays soccer wants to be Pele. I have a great responsibility to show them not just how to be like a soccer player, but how to be like a man.
quotes.author: Pele

quotes.quote: Sports creates a bond between contemporaries that lasts a lifetime. It also gives your life structure, discipline and a genuine, sincere, pure fulfillment that few other areas of endeavor provide.
quotes.author: Gail Devers

quotes.quote: The more I practice, the luckier I get
quotes.author: Gary Player

quotes.quote: They are who we thought they were!
quotes.author: Dennis Green

quotes.quote: To be the man, you have to beat the man.
quotes.author: Ric Flair

quotes.quote: Never give up, never give in, and when the upper hand is ours, may we have the ability to handle the win with the dignity that we absorbed the loss.
quotes.author: Doug Williams

quotes.quote: One man practicing sportsmanship is far better than 50 preaching it.
quotes.author: Knute Rockne

quotes.quote: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: They say that nobody is perfect. Then they tell you practice makes perfect. I wish they’d make up their minds.
quotes.author: Wilt Chamberlain

quotes.quote: Football doesn’t build character, it reveals
quotes.author: Marv Levy

quotes.quote: Football is like life – it requires perserverance, self-denial, hard work, sacrifice, dedication and respect for authority.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: It’s not bragging if you can back it up.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Win or lose you will never regret working hard, making sacrifices, being disciplined or focusing too much
quotes.author: John Smith

quotes.quote: The best activities for your health are pumping and humping.
quotes.author: Arnold

quotes.quote: You are never really playing an opponent. You are playing yourself, your own highest standards, and when you reach your limits, that is real joy.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: Don’t be afraid of failure. This is the way to succeed.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: One man can be a crucial ingredient on a team, but one man cannot make a team.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.quote: Everything negative – pressure, challenges – is all an opportunity for me to rise.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: The more difficult the victory, the greater the happiness in winning.
quotes.author: Pele

quotes.quote: Just keep going. Everybody gets better if they keep at it.
quotes.author: Ted Williams

quotes.quote: You play to win the game…Hello. You play to win the game.
quotes.author: Herman Edwards

quotes.quote: You have to expect things of yourself before you can do them.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: You find that you have peace of mind and can enjoy yourself, get more sleep, and rest when you know that it was a one hundred percent effort that you gave–win or lose.
quotes.author: Gordie Howe

quotes.quote: You are never really playing an opponent. You are playing yourself, your own highest standards, and when you reach your limits, that is real joy.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: What makes something special is not just what you have to gain, but what you feel there is to lose.
quotes.author: Andre Agassi

quotes.quote: If you can believe it, the mind can achieve it.
quotes.author: Ronnie Lott

quotes.quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: You’re never a loser until you quit trying
quotes.author: Mike Ditka

quotes.quote: A good hockey player plays where the puck is. A great hockey player plays where the puck is going to be
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: A goal is not always meant to be reached, it often serves simply as something to aim at
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: I never left the field saying I could have done more to get ready and that gives me piece of mind.
quotes.author: Peyton Manning

quotes.quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather in a lack of will.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: In the end, it’s extra effort that separates a winner from second place. But winning takes a lot more that, too. It starts with complete command of the fundamentals. Then it takes desire, determination, discipline, and self-sacrifice. And finally, it takes a great deal of love, fairness and respect for your fellow man. Put all these together, and even if you don’t win, how can you lose?
quotes.author: Jesse Owens

quotes.quote: If you aren’t going all the way, why go at all?
quotes.author: Joe Nameth

quotes.quote: To uncover your true potential you must first find your own limits and then you have to have the courage to blow past them.
quotes.author: Picabo Street

quotes.quote: Make sure your worst enemy doesn’t live between your own two ears.
quotes.author: Laird Hamilton

quotes.quote: There may be people that have more talent than you, but theres no excuse for anyone to work harder than you do.
quotes.author: Derek

quotes.quote: Don’t give up. Don’t ever give up.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: Going in one more round when you don’t think you can – that’s what makes all the difference in your life.
quotes.author: Rocky Balboa

quotes.quote: Without self-discipline, success is impossible, period.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Your biggest opponent isn’t the other guy. It’s human nature.
quotes.author: Bobby Knight

quotes.quote: The mind is the limit. As long as the mind can envision the fact that you can do something, you can do it, as long as you really believe 100 percent.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Ability is what you’re capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Do not let what you can not do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: It is not the size of a man but the size of his heart that matters.
quotes.author: Evander Holyfield

quotes.quote: If you fail to prepare, you’re prepared to fail.
quotes.author: Mark Spitz

quotes.quote: Pain is temporary. It may last a minute, or an hour, or a day, or a year, but eventually it will subside and something else will take its place. If I quit, however, it lasts forever.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: Sometimes the biggest problem is in your head. You’ve got to believe.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: Training gives us an outlet for suppressed energies created by stress and thus tones the spirit just as exercise conditions the body.
quotes.author: Arnold

quotes.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, ‘Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.’
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: If you’re bored with life — you don’t get up every morning with a burning desire to do things — you don’t have enough goals.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: I’ve got a theory that if you give 100% all of the time, somehow things will work out in the end.
quotes.author: Larry Bird

quotes.quote: Age is no barrier. It’s a limitation you put on your mind.
quotes.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quotes.quote: A good coach will make his players see what they can be rather than what they are
quotes.author: Ara Paraeghian

quotes.quote: It’s not the will to win that matters—everyone has that. It’s the will to prepare to win that matters.
quotes.author: Paul 'Bear' Bryant

quotes.quote: If you can’t outplay them, outwork them.
quotes.author: Ben Hogan

quotes.quote: I’ve learned that something constructive comes from every defeat.
quotes.author: Tom Landry

quotes.quote: It ain’t about how hard ya hit. It’s about how hard you can get it and keep moving forward. How much you can take and keep moving forward. That’s how winning is done
quotes.author: Rocky Balboa

quotes.quote: A champion is someone who gets up when he can’t.
quotes.author: Jack Dempsey

quotes.quote: Only a man who knows what it is like to be defeated can reach down to the bottom of his soul and come up with the extra ounce of power it takes to win when the match is even.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: It ain’t over till it’s over.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: It’s not the load that breaks you down – it’s the way you carry it
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Most talented players don’t always succeed. Some don’t even make the team. It’s more what’s inside.
quotes.author: Brett Favre

quotes.quote: When I’d get tired and want to stop, I’d wonder what my next opponent was doing.  I’d wonder if he was still working out.  I tried to visualize him.  When I could see him still working, I’d start pushing myself.  When I could see him in the shower, I’d push myself harder.
quotes.author: Dan Gable

quotes.quote: You’re never a loser until you quit trying.
quotes.author: Mike Ditka

quotes.quote: A trophy carries dust. Memories last forever.
quotes.author: Mary Lou Retton

quotes.quote: The highest compliment that you can pay me is to say that I work hard every day, that I never dog it.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: Doctors and scientists said breaking the four-minute mile was impossible, that one would die in the attempt. Thus, when I got up from the track after collapsing at the finish line, I figured I was dead
quotes.author: Roger Bannister

quotes.quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person’s determination.
quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.quote: The fight is won or lost far away from witnesses – behind the lines, in the gym, and out there on the road, long before I dance under those lights.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: If you train hard, you’ll not only be hard, you’ll be hard to beat.
quotes.author: Herschel Walker

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength
quotes.author: Arnold

quotes.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, “Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down; it’s whether you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: You miss 100 percent of the shots you don’t take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: I’ve missed more than 9,000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I’ve been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Micheal Jordan

quotes.quote: Never give up! Failure and rejection are only the first step to succeeding
quotes.author: Jim Valvano
